name: Brix (itch) (tonyrobots)
description:
BRIX is very much in development, though I think the core gameplay is there, and even kind of fun. Considering adding a bunch of features, like:

- power ups selected by the player

- environmental challenges (e.g. walls, non-straight borders, moving shooter, etc.)

- other stuff

Also probably want a new name? Not sure. Anyway, let me know if you think this is any fun, and if you have feedback at all. Thank you!
